summary: Not only were the Werewolves castrated (or Ken-iffied), they also lack proper \"details\" under the tail. So seeing as I was extremely bored, I spent the better half of a day making this and trying to get the placement just right. It\'s a very simple mod and made by an amateur at this type of thing, but hopefully someone out there will find it...us
descriptionHtml:
To Install simply extract the .zip in Skyrim\'s Data folder

Intended for use alongside Derrax\'s Male Werewolves mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4445

Not only were the Werewolves castrated (or Ken-iffied), they also lack proper \"details\" under the tail. So seeing as I was extremely bored, I spent the better half of a day making this and trying to get the placement just right. It\'s a very simple mod and made by an amateur at this type of thing, but hopefully someone out there will find it...useful XD
author: Farron122
